info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hillsdale County through 815 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reading, or near Hillsdale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hillsdale around 730 PM EDT. Jonesville around 735 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Cambria, Shadyside, Osseo, North Adams, Lake Wilson, Frontier, Jerome, Somerset Center, Bear Lake and Moscow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
